HEADER.HOMEHEADING: MyPossa, your Visa card in Africa by Mobile Money for online payments.
HEADER.HOMESUB: MyPossa offers you the opportunity to get a Visa virtual card for your online payments from Africa by Orange money, Mobile Money and others. Get your account today and start sending and receiving money around the world.

SOLUTIONS.TPESUB: A Mobile Point of Sale system is a handheld device equipped with technology that lets it act as a standard POS system
SOLUTIONS.PAYSUB: Online payment merchant solution with API
SOLUTIONS.TONTINESUB: We support associations in the management of their tontines
SOLUTIONS.DIASPORASUB: Send money or airtime to loved ones from abroad
SOLUTIONS.VCARDSUB: We provide VISA or Mastercard virtual cards for your online payments

SERVICES.HEADING: Our Services
SERVICES.BILLSUB: Pay your CAMWATER or ENEO invoices and your CANAL + subscription
SERVICES.TRFSUB: Deposit and withdrawal of money from Mobile Money or Orange Money. MyPossa money transfer is free
SERVICES.XAFSUB: Buy airtime and Data around the world

MAP.H2: CAMEROUN, COTE D'IVOIRE, MALI, TOGO, RDC, BENIN
